What are the treatments for Childhood Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma ?,"Key Points
                    - There are different types of treatment for children with non-Hodgkin lymphoma.     - Children with non-Hodgkin lymphoma should have their treatment planned by a team of doctors who are experts in treating childhood cancer.    - Some cancer treatments cause side effects months or years after treatment has ended.     - Six types of stand
